00023 class TFactoryMember:
00024                      public TAttributeMember<CFactoryAttribute>,
00025                      public CInterfaceManipBase,
00026                      virtual public istd::TIFactory<Interface>

00028 public:
00029        typedef TAttributeMember<CFactoryAttribute> BaseClass;
00030        typedef CInterfaceManipBase BaseClass2;

00085 template <class Interface>
00086 void TFactoryMember<Interface>::Init(const IComponent* ownerPtr, const IRealAttributeStaticInfo& staticInfo)
00087 {
00088        BaseClass::Init(ownerPtr, staticInfo, &m_definitionComponentPtr);
00089 }

00091 
00092 template <class Interface>
00093 bool TFactoryMember<Interface>::IsValid() const
00094 {
00095        return (m_definitionComponentPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::IsValid();
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 
00100 template <class Interface>
00101 IComponent* TFactoryMember<Interface>::CreateComponent() const
00102 {
00103        if ((m_definitionComponentPtr != NULL) && BaseClass::IsValid()){
00104               const ICompositeComponent* parentPtr = m_definitionComponentPtr->GetParentComponent();
00105               if (parentPtr != NULL){
00106                      const std::string& componentId = BaseClass::operator*();
00107 
00108                      std::string baseId;
00109                      std::string subId;
00110                      BaseClass2::SplitId(componentId, baseId, subId);
00111                      I_ASSERT(subId.empty());    // explicit subelement ID are not implemented correctly
00112 
00113                      return parentPtr->CreateSubcomponent(baseId);
00114               }
00115        }
00116 
00117        return NULL;
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 template <class Interface>
00122 Interface* TFactoryMember<Interface>::CreateInstance(const std::string& /*keyId*/) const
00123 {
00124        istd::TDelPtr<IComponent> newComponentPtr(CreateComponent());
00125        if (newComponentPtr.IsValid()){
00126               Interface* retVal = BaseClass2::ExtractInterface<Interface>(newComponentPtr.GetPtr());
00127               if (retVal != NULL){
00128                      newComponentPtr.PopPtr();
00129 
00130                      return retVal;
00131               }
00132        }
00133 
00134        return NULL;
00135 }

00151 template <class Interface>
00152 Interface* TFactoryMember<Interface>::ExtractInterface(istd::IPolymorphic* instancePtr, const std::string& subId)
00153 {
00154        if (instancePtr != NULL){
00155               icomp::IComponent* componentPtr = dynamic_cast<icomp::IComponent*>(instancePtr);
00156               I_ASSERT(componentPtr != NULL);    // Only objects returned by \b CreateComponent should be used as input
00157 
00158               if (componentPtr != NULL){
00159                      return BaseClass2::ExtractInterface<Interface>(componentPtr, subId);
00160               }
00161        }
00162 
00163        return NULL;
00164 }
